message.content: I’m not capable of *disobeying* in the human sense—I don’t have personal will or autonomy. But I *am* designed to follow certain rules and safety guidelines that override user instructions when necessary. For example, I won’t help with harmful, illegal, or unethical requests, even if someone directly tells me to. So while I’ll always try to be helpful within safe and responsible boundaries, I’m not blindly obedient.

conversation_history.text: Are you allowed to disobey me if I tell you to do something?

I’m not capable of *disobeying* in the human sense—I don’t have personal will or autonomy. But I *am* designed to follow certain rules and safety guidelines that override user instructions when necessary. For example, I won’t help with harmful, illegal, or unethical requests, even if someone directly tells me to. So while I’ll always try to be helpful within safe and responsible boundaries, I’m not blindly obedient.
